title: 3 and Out - Pats Run Over Bills MNF Reaction, Steelers Culture, Minshew Moment, Joe Brady Crash, Mario 2 The U, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Pats Run Over Bills MNF Reaction, Steelers Culture, Minshew Moment, Joe Brady Crash, Mario 2 The U, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Patriots grinding out a road win over the Bills while throwing only three passes, and gives some bright spots for Buffalo in the loss. He also recaps week 13 action, including the Steelers last second win over the Ravens, the return of Minshew mania in Philly and his viral moment with his pops, gives his take on offensive coaching prodigy Joe Brady getting fired in Carolina, and his take on Mario Cristobal leaving Oregon to return to The U as HC. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure to follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
